about_the_game:
An Accessibility First Real Time Strategy Game
Built from the ground up to work with only one hand and limited sight. Entirely single player all movement and control is preformed via keyboard, the camera system was designed around the physical layout of the number pad on keyboards.

Options customisation
Fully rebindable keys and the ability to create fully personalised colour profiles for all text that is saved across play sessions.

Unique Control Scheme
You have 9 primary cameras each linked to a number key from here you can see a large part of the map and build units, then for refined control selecting, moving and setting waypoints. Press a modifier key default Ctrl or Number pad Insert then another number key to access the specific are of the map, for example by pressing 9 then Modifier key 9 you are in the top right of the map pressing 1 modifier 1 takes you to the bottom left. A full tutorial is available.

Current and future content
The game features three factions but only one currently playable one within the campaign focusing on the Anubi, campaign missions do feature styled maps the bare screen shots are to help envision how the camera quadrants work and used in the tutorial.
